meanings.definition: The state or quality of being promiscuous.
meanings.sent1: Her promiscuity led to rumors and gossip in the small town.
meanings.sent2: The dangers of promiscuity include the risk of contracting sexually transmitted infections.
meanings.sent3: Despite her promiscuity, she always kept her heart guarded.
meanings.sent4: In the world of nature, the promiscuity of pollen transfer ensures genetic diversity.
meanings.sent5: The promiscuity of the artist's style made it difficult to categorize their work.

meanings.definition: The practice of having casual sexual relations frequently with different partners.
meanings.sent1: His promiscuity eventually led to a reputation as a player.
meanings.sent2: Promiscuity can have emotional consequences as well as physical ones.
meanings.sent3: The promiscuity of the characters in the soap opera kept viewers guessing.
meanings.sent4: The promiscuity of the market caused fluctuations in stock prices.
meanings.sent5: The promiscuity of the social media influencer's posts attracted a wide audience.

meanings.sent1: The promiscuity use of pesticides harmed the environment.
meanings.sent2: Promiscuity spending habits can lead to financial trouble.
meanings.sent3: The promiscuity mixing of colors created a chaotic painting.
meanings.sent4: The promiscuity distribution of resources left many without proper support.
meanings.sent5: The promiscuity behavior of the toddler caused chaos in the classroom.
